channel.title: Exp help
channel.description: ok most of the stuff in my skiller area doesnt work...how do i make it so that when i click an item it gives exp? i love you forever if you help me =)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 06, 2009, 03:02:13 pm[/size][hr]can anyone help me?

item.title: Exp help
item.dc:creator: @P_16 P 16
item.description:
@P_16 wrote:

add something like this to your first click objects

case ####: if (actionTimer == 0) { addSkillXP((1700 * playerLevel[14]), 14); addItem(1436, 1); sendMessage("!#$%^&*$^%$%"); setAnimation(624); actionTimer = 5; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } break;

change

addSkillXP((1700 * playerLevel[14]), 14);

to your xp rate and skill number

changesetAnimation(624);

to your emote number
change

sendMessage("!#$%^&*$^%$%");

to your message

changecase ####

to your object id

and finally change

addItem(1436, 1);

to whatever item you want to add =)

so it should look something like this

case 2111: if (actionTimer == 0) { addSkillXP((1700 * playerLevel[14]), 14); addItem(1436, 1); sendMessage("You Gain Some Mining, and get some Rune Ess"); setAnimation(624); actionTimer = 5; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } break;

Read full topic
